attributes.action: Give further thought before allowing the spread of vehicle charges as in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My wife and I are both pensioners, and feel that what we call, `Blanket Charges`will make it difficult for many
people in retirement; especially with pensions at present falling further behind inflation. Further thought should be given to this sector of the community before the Government  trys to legislate further

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
